title: Autocorrect with Python
description: Have you ever thought about how the autocorrect features works in the keyboard of a smartphone? Almost every smartphone brand irrespective of its price provides an autocorrect feature in their keyboards today. So let’s understand how the autocorrect features works. In this article, I will take you through how to build autocorrect with Python.
